snippet: The premiere of "Oprah's Next Chapter," the once-a-week successor to her five-day-a-week "Oprah Winfrey Show," drew far fewer viewers than had watched her previous talk show on local TV stations each weekday.
abstract: The premiere of "Oprah's Next Chapter," the once-a-week successor to her five-day-a-week "Oprah Winfrey Show," drew far fewer viewers than had watched her previous talk show on local TV stations each weekday.
